meanings.sent1: I put my toys in the bins to keep my room tidy.
meanings.sent2: The bins in the kitchen hold all the different types of cereal.
meanings.sent3: The bins in the garage were so full, they looked like they were about to burst!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a series of bins, each holding memories of a different color.
meanings.sent5: The bins in the classroom were labeled with bright colors to help the students organize their supplies.

meanings.definition: To throw away or discard something
meanings.sent1: After the party, we had to bins all the leftover food.
meanings.sent2: She bins the old newspapers every Sunday for recycling.
meanings.sent3: He bins his broken toys with a dramatic flair, pretending to be a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The decision to bins her old clothes symbolized a fresh start for her.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to bins the burnt toast and start over to get it just right.
